text: addehattin (putran) isakhineyum (petran) ya'akhubineyum nam pradanam ceyyukayuntayi. addehattinre santatiparamparayil pravacakatvavum vedavum nam nalkukayum ceytu. ihaleakatt addehattin nam pratiphalam nalkiyittunt‌. paraleakatt tirccayayum addeham sajjanannalute kuttattilayirikkukayum ceyyum
